column4: set the player to use "xv"    i personally prefer smplayer, its a frontend for mplayer thats a LOT better than mplayers default and works welll.. ive tried a lot of em as ive had video playback problems
lack of options in totem and seeking sucks,  smplayer all the way for me..
i even think smplayer is better than vlc (odd i know)..
of course it is. anything is better thanvlc :D
